title: Life at 50C: Keeping cool in India's heatwaves
content: This video can not be playedHeatwaves are becoming more common in India due to global warming. There’s nowhere to hide especially if you live in a crowded city like Ahmedabad.Shakeela Bano struggles to get her grandson Mohammed to fall asleep in their one room house due to the heat.But as the Life at 50C series on climate change finds out, there’s one solution which doesn't cost the Earth.
